extendedInfo.description: ChemInform Acronyms contains more than 900 acronyms of chemical substances or fragments which have been collected from about 100 chemical journals. In view of the thousands of acronyms devised by authors in the chemical literature, this list is certainly not comprehensive, but it is useful for the identification of the more common abbreviations.Keywords: synthetic, organic, chemistry, reaction, acronym, abbreviation, substance, journal, science

reviews.title: nice app
reviews.comment: perfect companion to my advanced organic synthesis course
reviews.author: A Google User
